title: HoP 124 - The Chosen Ones - Judaism and Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 124 - The Chosen Ones - Judaism and Philosophy
description: The roots of Jewish philosophy in the Islamic world, focusing on the Rabbinic background in the Mishnah and Talmud, and the thought of early figures like Isaac Israeli.
